title: How to Beat One in the Chamber in Minecraft

steps.headline: Keep moving.
steps.description: Nearly everyone uses the arrow, which is insta-death, and if you are still you are an easy target. Keep on the move!

steps.headline: Move left and right instead of a straight line.
steps.description: This will make you a harder target.

steps.headline: Save your arrow.
steps.description: You only have one shot with your arrow, make it count!

steps.headline: Practice your aim.
steps.description: If you "misfire" when you use your arrow, you'll have to kill someone with the sword to get it back. Try shooting bats in Survival or a moving mob.

steps.headline: Jump while using your sword, as you may get a critical hit and do more damage, whilst also making yourself a harder target.

text: Keep moving. Nearly everyone uses the arrow, which is insta-death, and if you are still you are an easy target. Keep on the move! Move left and right instead of a straight line. This will make you a harder target. Save your arrow. You only have one shot with your arrow, make it count! Practice your aim. If you "misfire" when you use your arrow, you'll have to kill someone with the sword to get it back. Try shooting bats in Survival or a moving mob. Jump while using your sword, as you may get a critical hit and do more damage, whilst also making yourself a harder target.
